name: wanderer
description: Wanderer is a self-hosted feed and content reader that aggregates blog posts, newsletters, and articles into one place with a calm, focused reading interface.
features: Feed aggregation: Collect blog posts, newsletters, and articles from multiple sources into a unified reading interface.
RSS support: Subscribe to RSS and Atom feeds from your favorite websites and blogs for automatic content updates.
Reading mode: Enjoy distraction-free reading with clean typography and customizable themes for comfortable viewing.
Content filtering: Set up rules to filter or prioritize content based on keywords, sources, or publication dates.
Offline reading: Download articles for offline access when traveling or in areas without internet connectivity.
Search functionality: Find specific articles or topics quickly with full-text search across all saved content.
Reading progress: Track which articles you've read and mark favorites for easy reference later.
Mobile optimized: Access your reading list from any device with a responsive design that adapts to screen sizes.
Import/export: Migrate feed subscriptions using OPML import and export for easy setup or backup.
Keyboard shortcuts: Navigate and manage articles efficiently with customizable keyboard shortcuts for power users.
Article sharing: Share interesting articles via email or generate shareable links for friends and colleagues.
Auto-cleanup: Automatically remove old articles after a specified period to keep your reading list manageable.
